data.question: What is the chemical formula for the compound synthesized from thallium ethoxide and [H(OEt2)2][H2N{B(C6F5)3}2] under diethyl ether?
What is the space group of the crystal structure for [Tl(OEt2)4][H2N{B(C6F5)3}2]?
Is the [H2N{B(C6F5)3}2]- anion in [Tl(OEt2)4][H2N{B(C6F5)3}2] well-resolved?
What type of disorder is present in the cation of [Tl(OEt2)4][H2N{B(C6F5)3}2]?
data.answer: The cation is disordered with multiple thallium atom sites.
